fields.name: Mirage Blade
fields.description: +60 Attack Damage +15% Critical Strike +12% Life Steal UNIQUE Passive - Mark of the Sands: Basic Attacks apply a Sand Mark on the target revealing them for 3 seconds. Only one enemy can be Marked at any time. UNIQUE Active - Mirage Step: Teleport 350 units directly away from the Sand Marked target (60 second cooldown). ''Shurimans exploit every aspect of the desert.''
